statements: SELECT * FROM equipment_sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT equipment_id, sensor_id, timestamp FROM equipment_sensor_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT equipment_id, sensor_id, humidity FROM equipment_sensor_data WHERE equipment_id = 2 OR sensor_id = 3
SELECT temperature FROM equipment_sensor_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY temperature ASC
SELECT equipment_id, sensor_id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM equipment_sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND humidity > 60
SELECT equipment_id, sensor_id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM equipment_sensor_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT timestamp, equipment_id, humidity, sensor_id FROM equipment_sensor_data WHERE humidity < 60 ORDER BY equipment_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM equipment_sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 3 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM equipment_sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING avg_temp > 30
SELECT equipment_id, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(humidity) AS min_humidity FROM equipment_sensor_data GROUP BY equipment_id ORDER BY max_temp DESC
SELECT * FROM equipment_data ORDER BY equipment_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value FROM equipment_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT equipment_id, timestamp FROM equipment_data WHERE sensor_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_type, event_date FROM maintenance_events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM maintenance_events WHERE event_type = 'repair';
SELECT * FROM equipment_data WHERE sensor_value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT equipment_id, AVG(sensor_value) as avg_value FROM equipment_data GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING avg_value > 30;
SELECT event_type, COUNT(*) as event_count FROM maintenance_events GROUP BY event_type ORDER BY event_count DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, event_date, event_description FROM equipment_data JOIN maintenance_events ON equipment_data.equipment_id = maintenance_events.equipment_id ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND sensor_value < 20;
SELECT equipment_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM equipment_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT * FROM equipment_data WHERE sensor_value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, COUNT(*) FROM maintenance_records GROUP BY equipment_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT equipment_id, MAX(maintenance_date) FROM maintenance_records GROUP BY equipment_id;
SELECT equipment_id, last_update, status FROM equipment_status WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM equipment_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, sensor_value FROM equipment_data INNER JOIN equipment_status ON equipment_data.equipment_id = equipment_status.equipment_id WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_type, technician_id FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type LIKE '%repair%';
SELECT * FROM equipment_data WHERE sensor_type = 'humidity' AND sensor_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM equipment WHERE equipment_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, sensor_type, reading FROM equipment JOIN sensor_data ON equipment.equipment_id = sensor_data.equipment_id;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, equipment_id, sensor_type, reading FROM sensor_data WHERE reading > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT maintenance_type FROM maintenance_logs;
SELECT equipment_id, analysis_result FROM predictive_analysis WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%failure%';
SELECT * FROM equipment_sensor_data;
SELECT equipment_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM equipment_sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer FROM equipment WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT maintenance_type, maintenance_date, technician_name FROM maintenance_logs WHERE equipment_id = 3;
SELECT equipment_id, analysis_date, predicted_failure FROM predictive_maintenance_analysis WHERE confidence_level > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM equipment_sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, AVG(sensor_value) AS avg_sensor_value FROM equipment_sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT e.equipment_name, m.maintenance_type FROM equipment e INNER JOIN maintenance_logs m ON e.equipment_id = m.equipment_id;
SELECT analysis_date, equipment_id, confidence_level FROM predictive_maintenance_analysis WHERE predicted_failure = true ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE scheduled_maintenance_date >= CURRENT_DATE();
